title: [Fan Game] League of Legends quiz with multiplayer battles

embed.description: LoL: Summoner's Quiz Compete online with LoL fans from all around the world or play offline and achieve incredible high scores! Countless questions around League of Legends Champions and Items are waiting for you Summoner, do you have what it takes to reach Challenger tier? Check it out on the

body:
Hey everyone,

I've spent most of my last months working on a passion project of mine: I've developed a quiz game I like to play with lots of questions, multiple languages available and international multiplayer quiz battles, no matter what language the opponent is speaking.

The game is currently available for free on iOS and Android in English, German, Turkish, Korean and French with more languages and more question types to come early december, specially now that version 7.22 is out!

I hope you're trying and enjoying the quiz as much as me and my friends do. You'll notice a small amount of ads from time to time, I kept the amount to a minimum and didn't make them invasive, but as I am paying for the server that powers the multiplayer mode I hope to be able to finance that one through the game - best case.

Anyway, here's my game, enjoy everyone! Leave your feedback here if you want, I'm looking forward to reading it.

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.IdleGameStudio.SummonersQuiz 
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1300128087

Trailer: https://youtu.be/8rMTy7LvTZw

Kend0r
